actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to permit the surviving spouse and unmarried children of a person interred in a cemetery located on a military installation to be interred in such cemetery.

summary.text: Permits the surviving spouse and unmarried children of a person interred in a cemetery located on a military installation to be interred in such cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to permit the surviving spouse and unmarried children of a person interred in a cemetery located on a military installation to be interred in such cemetery.
